item.title: Issue #2434 created
item.description:
`fn:has-children`: buggy examples?

I believe that the recently added examples for fn:has-children need to be fixed (or itâ€™s my brain that needs to be updated):

[1,2,3] => has-children()
[] => has-children()

The function signature expects gnode()? as input type, so I would expect both queries to return an error unless the arguments are not explicitly wrapped into a JNode.
